reviewText: This collection is great for both children AND adults. Highlights include a Little Lulu cartoon - "A Bout with a Trout" - featuring the Bing Crosby tune "Swing on a star," that emphasizes the importance of attending school when Lulu tries to play hooky to go fishing and three Ray Harryhausen animated fairy tales from 1947.The Fantastic Films of Ray Harryhausen - Legendary Monster Series (Jason and the Argonauts / The Seventh Voyage of Sinbad / The Golden Voyage of Sinbad / Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger / The 3 Worlds of Gulliver)
